name: Splitter Splatter
description:
If the WebGL doesn't act right, try downloading the Windows build.

Submission for Mini Game Jam 2022. 

Theme: Colors

Limitations: You are your own enemy

Caption:

Play as a janitor which has been ordered to keep the room clean! Wouldn't it be a shame if you also contribute to the mess you're supposed to clean?

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys - Move Up/Down/Left/Right
  • Z - Rotate the mop counterclockwise
  • X - Rotate the mop clockwise
  • Esc - Pause

More Gameplay Details:

  • Clean the paint splats and your foot prints using your mop!
  • Clean your footprints by going to a water bucket! Real neat huh?
  • If there are 50 or more paint splats and footprints in the room then the game is over.
  • Your score only increases when you clean the paint splats, not your own colored footprints you cheeky one.
  • Clear all the paint in the room for an added bonus score!

Enjoy!
